Ever Evolving, Community Driven, Free

GlPortal is a free engine and computer game that is developed in colaboration with developes, artists and fans from all over the world.

We blend.

We use Blender for all of our assets and our map editor is a Blender plugin. If you are a Blender enthusiast, contact us to join our team.

GlPortal is a free 3d action adventure

Quick Start

GlPortal is a free game for GNU/Linux, Windows and Mac OS X. GlPortal is under heavy development.
